title: Cheese veg pie
ingredients: ['1 medium head broccoli, cut into florets', '1 medium cauliflower, cut into florets', '8 to 10 Brussels sprouts, trimmed (optional)', '3 carrots, peeled and sliced', '40g butter', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '400ml whole milk', '300g cheese of your choice, grated', '2 large potatoes, peeled and sliced thinly into rounds']
